answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a. 20m² - 12m

b. 3x² + 11x + 10

Penjelasan dengan langkah-langkah:

a. 4m (5m - 3)

= (4m x 5m) - (4m x 3)

= 20m² - 12m

b. (3x + 5)(x + 2)

= (3x * x + 3x * 2) + (5 * x + 5 * 2)

= 3x² + 6x + 5x + 10

= 3x² + 11x + 10

related_questions.question:
Jika y - x = 4 - y - x , maka nilai y adalah ...    a.1

b.2

c.3

d.4

e.5

​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

B) 2

Penjelasan dengan langkah-langkah:

SPLSV

y - x = 4 - y - x

y + y - x + x = 4

2y = 4

y = 4/2

y = 2 ✔

related_questions.question: Diketahui dua lingkaran dengan jari-jari yang sama yaitu 4 cm.Jika jarak kedua pusat lingkaran adalah 17 cm,maka garis singgung persekutuan dalam kedua lingkaran adalah

220 meter banding 3,2 km
tolong dijawab dengan caranya jangan ngasal ​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

11 : 160

Penjelasan dengan langkah-langkah:

PERBANDINGAN

1 km = 1.000 m

220 m : 3,2 km

= 220 : (3,2 × 1.000)

= 220 : 3.200

= 11 : 160 ✔

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

[tex] | = . {?}^{?} | [/tex]

I recently moved to another town. I was very anxious on the first day I didn't know anyone. I went to the classroom and entered the room. While I was entering the room, I felt that everybody's eyes were on me I became even more anxious then. Fortunately, Mrs. Dian, the civic teacher, was right behind me. She greeted me and introduced me to the class. It turned out that my classmates were friendly. They showed me around and helped me get to know the school. At the end of the day, I was less and less anxious. I will always remember my first day at my school. Posted by Rafi

4. Bagaimana cara membedakan panjang dan lebar suatu bidang datar?
(Matematika
***
(Matematika
Jawab:
5. Jelaskan pengertian bangun datar!
Jawab:​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. Suatu disiplin ilmu yang menerapkan ilmu pengetahuan tentang bahan pangan.

2. Kedelai hitam.

3. Naik-turunnya lagu seperti bunyi dan nada secara berturut-turut yang dilakukan secara beraturan.

4. Panjang ukurannya lebih daripada lebar.

5. Bangun-bangun yang berbentuk dua dimensi.

related_questions.question:
Bentu sederhana dari 
sini x / 1-cos x adalah​

answers.answer:
Jawab:

sin x/1-cos x  (dikali sekawannya yaitu 1+cosx/1+cosx)

(sin x) (1+cos x) / (1-cos2x)

=(sin x) (1+cos x) / (sin x) (sin x)

=(1+cos x) / sin x

1-cos2x (cos kuadrat x) = sin2x (sin kuadrat x)
